Package mesquite.lib.characters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdjustableDistribution
    An interface to signal that a CharacterDistribution can be changed (i.e.
    AltererAlignShift  
    AltererContinuousTransformations  
    AltererConvertGapMissPolyUncert  
    AltererDNACell  
    AltererRandomizations  
    AltererSimpleCell  
    AltererWholeCharacterAddRemove  
    CharacterDistribution
    Stores the states in the terminal taxa.
    CharacterHistory
    Stores the states at all the nodes of a tree.
    CharacterStatesHolder
    Stores the character states at a series of terminal taxa or nodes in a tree.
    CharHistoryContainer
    Stores a CharacterHistory.
    CharSpecsSet
    This abstract class serves to superclass weight sets, model sets, inclusion sets, character sets, and any other listing of characters with specification of values for each character.
    CLikelihoodCalculator
    An object (e.g.
    CModelEstimator
    A character model that can estimate its own parameters.
    MAdjustableDistribution
    An interface to signal that a MCharactersDistribution can be changed (i.e.
    MCharactersDistribution
    Stores states at each of the terminal taxa, for each of many characters.
    MCharactersHistory
    Stores the reconstructed or simulated states at each of the nodes of a tree, for each of many characters.
    MCharactersStatesHolder
    Stores the character states for multiple characters at a series of terminal taxa or nodes in a tree.
    SlicedCharacterHistory
    A CharacterHistory that can indicate changes within branches, e.g.for stochastic character mapping
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlteredDataParameters  
    CellBlock  
    CentralModelListener
    A class for the object belonging to the project that serves as central location for listening to models and reporting to those interested if one changed.
    CharacterData
    An object of this class represents a Characters block within a NEXUS file.
    CharacterModel
    Models of character evolution are represented by objects of subclasses of CharacterModel.
    CharacterPartition
    A CharacterPartition is a specification of which property applies to each character (CHARPARTITION in NEXUS 1 file format).
    CharactersBlock
    A block in a NEXUS file representing a CharacterData
    CharactersGroup
    A group to which characters may belong.
    CharactersGroupVector
    Stores a list of character groups (partitions).
    CharacterState
    An abstraction of a state of a character to allow categorical, continuous and other subclasses.
    CharacterStates
    Stores the character states at a series of terminal taxa or nodes in a tree.
    CharacterStateTest
    An object a module can create and pass back to store in module info.
    CharacterSubmodel
    An intermediary superclass that subclasses can extend to help with GUI, so that choices know whether a model is complete (e.g, as in composite DNA mode) or a submodel (e.g., state frequencies model with DNA)
    CharBitsSet
    A specset with bit information about characters.
    CharInclusionSet
    A character inclusion set.
    CharNumSet
    A specset with number information about characters.
    CharObjectSpecsSet  
    CharSelectionSet
    A character set.
    CharSort
    a sorting for characters.
    CharWeightSet
    a weight set for characters.
    CodonPositionsSet
    a designation of codon positions for characters.
    DefaultReference
    A reference to a default model for CharacterData objects.
    MCharactersStates
    An abstract class for an array of character states for many characters, at each of the taxa or nodes.
    ModelCompatibilityInfo  
    ModelSet
    A ModelSet is a specification of which character model applies to each character (TYPESET in NEXUS 1 file format).
    ModelVector
    a set of Models, for file to keep track of all of its defined character models.
    ProbabilityModel
    Sublcass of models of character evolution for likelihood and other calculations involving stochastic models of character evolution.
    ProbabilityModelSet
    a ModelSet for probability models.
    StoredCharacterHistory
    Used to store character History connected with a tree.
    TaxaInfo  
    WholeCharacterModel
    An intermediary superclass that subclasses can extend to help with GUI, so that choices know whether a model is complete (e.g, as in composite DNA mode) or a submodel (e.g., state frequencies model with DNA)
